title: How to make vegan ground beef - Quora

response.answer_text: It's sad that people have to waste time parsing words. Let me interpret what the questioner wants to know. How can you make a vegan replacement for ground beef? Was that intent so hard to figure out? I don't use it often but when I want something like this say for tacos I just reconstitute some TVP with a mixture of vegetable bkroth, soy sauce, and a couple of other ingredients.

You grind the cow, meat, bones, offal and all, dig it into the ground and then plant mung beans into it. Thus fertilised, it would miraculously turn into nice and wholesome vegan food. The mung beans, you can turn into tofu, or any other fake food to your liking. Easy. Oh yes, I forgot to mention that you would have to kill the poor beast first.
